Antharas Watchman Gilmore: ... The Heart of Warding is a doorway that was made by those who imprisoned Antharas... A "Portal Stone" activates it. "Antharas Watchman Theodric" distributes Portal stones to those who have been approved by the seal watchmen. If you wish to obtain a Portal Stone, you should go and see Gabrielle. Gain her approval and then come back to see me...
